text: Ochrosia kauaiensis, the Kauai yellowwood, is a species of plant in the family Apocynaceae. It is endemic to the island of Kauai in Hawaii. It is threatened by habitat loss. ==References== Category:Trees of Hawaii Category:Endemic flora of Hawaii kauaiensis Category:Endangered plants Category:Taxonomy articles created by Polbot
title: Ochrosia kauaiensis
